Name: Thriller
Description: Thriller film, also known as suspense film or suspense thriller, is a broad film genre that involves excitement and suspense in the audience.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Name: Biopic
Description: A biopic tells the life story of a historical person or at least the most historically important years of their lives.

Name: Drama
Description: A Drama is focused on emotions and defined by conflict, often looking to reality rather than sensationalism.

Name: Science Fiction
Description: Science-fiction films are defined by a combination of imaginative speculation and a scientific or technological premise, making use of the changes and trajectory of technology and science.

Name: Crime
Description: Crime movies focus on criminal acts and especially on the investigation, either by an amateur or a professional detective, of a serious crime, generally a murder.

Name: Romance
Description: Primarily focuses on the relationship and romantic love between two people.

Name: Action
Description: In action films the protagonists face a series of events that typically includeÂ violence, extended fighting, physical feats, rescues and frantic chases. The hero is struggling against incredible odds, which include life-threatening situations, a dangerous villain, or a pursuit which usually concludes in victory for the hero.
